About Me

A results-driven sales and management professional with an entrepreneurial focus and proven track record for significantly increasing revenue

Skills

Managing and leading a team of 6 associates, ensuring accuracy with all orders, pricing, and billing, reporting directly to the VP of Sales.

Results Oriented
